content: this my amigurumi pattern for ditmar the dachshund this printable pdf sausage dog crochet pattern includes written and detailed photo instructions i have a free version of the pattern on my website https //stellasyarnuniverse com/dachshund-amigurumi-pattern/ this pdf pattern is simply for those of you who prefer a pdf version of the pattern that can be accessed offline or printed **about the pattern** this downloadable pdf pattern has detailed step-by-step instructions that are accompanied by high quality photos of the process the pattern includes photo tutorials on how to make a magic_ring invisible decreases in single_crochet color changes in single_crochet closing small rounds and invisible finishes **construction** the dachshund is crocheted from bottom to top the legs are crocheted on the ears head and tail are sewn on the nose is embroidered **required materials and tools** * cotton yarn in a dk / light worsted weight in 2 different colors * 2 5mm crochet hook / size b-1 or c-2 depending on how tightly you crochet * 5mm safety eyes or black embroidery floss * black embroidery floss * fiberfill * stitch markers * yarn needle * large eyed sewing needle * scissors **size** if using the recommended yarn weight and hook size your amigurumi sausage dog will be about 2 25 / 5 5cm tall and 2 5 / 6cm long **language ** english us i m always happy to help don t hesitate to message me here on ravelry or email me at stellasyarnuniverse at outlook com if you need help with the download or the pattern thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
